events.message: The customer reported a car collision incident that occurred on the highway yesterday afternoon.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured vehicle.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to manage this auto accident claim for prompt processing.
The customer was contacted and the claim has been acknowledged along with a summary of next steps shared.
Request sent to customer asking for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including police report and repair shop quotes.
Investigation has commenced to verify the details of the vehicle collision and assess damages.
The investigation report has been finalized confirming fault and damage extent in the accident.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair estimates and policy terms, sent to customer.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with service.
The claim was approved officially following customer acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account today.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after successful payment and customer confirmation.
All documents and communications related to this auto accident claim were archived for record keeping.
